description: This is a fantasy story of sexual slavery ran by the cruel Mistress Sandra. Seven, Kat, and Annie are her slaves. They will produce good money, but first they must learn discipline through punishment and they must be clean. Mark Davis and Lee Stone are two patrons who indulge in their temporary ownership of three submissives.
title: Adrianna Nicole, Annie Cruz, Sandra Romain, Kat, Lee Stone and Mark Davis
